items.title: Be prepared for almost anything with this magnetic multi-USB cable and adapter kit, now $13.50
items.summary:
Elebase Multi-USB Cable and Adapter Kit

Buy for $13.50 (Reg. $15)

Clip the on-page 10% off coupon.

What we love

While most of just want to skip to a world where just about everything uses USB-C, we aren’t there yet, and who knows if we ever will be. That said, a versatile kit like this can help you interact with various types of ports thanks to various adapters that can be found inside of the magnetic case. Examples include a compact 100W USB-C cable, adapters ranging from USB-A to microUSB, Lightning, and more.
